logodetection

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • logodetection.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static geometric methods for refining the results given by RANSAC algorithm RobustMatcher.matchImages(org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat, org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat, org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_features2d.KeyPoint, org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat, org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Mat, org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_features2d.KeyPoint, org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Rect)

        Parameters:

      • checkQuadrilateral

        public static boolean checkQuadrilateral(double[][] scene_corners,
                         org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Rect roi)
        Performs testing of quadrilateral obtained by transformation of the corners of logo template onto frame, after the logo has been detected. 1. Checks if it's not smaller than 10x10 pixel square

        2. Checks if it's not too large and does fall outside the patch

        3. Checks if it's not too flattened

        4. Checks that it is a convex quadrilateral.

        Parameters:
        scene_corners - corners of quadrilateral
        roi - the patch coordinates where this logo
        Returns:
        true if quadrilateral satisfies all requirements, false otherwise.

      • bestBoundingBoxFast

        public static org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Rect bestBoundingBoxFast(java.util.ArrayList<org.bytedeco.javacpp.opencv_core.Point2f> list,
                                                        double accuracy)
        Given list of points find the rectangle of minimal area which includes at least accuracy*100% points. O(n^3)
        Parameters:
        list - - list of 2D points
        accuracy - - the ratio
        Returns:
        the rectangle enclosing points.
